trans-unit.source: Sets a static, iconic bitmap to display a live preview (also known as a Peek preview) of a window or tab

seg-source.mrk: Sets a static, iconic bitmap to display a live preview (also known as a Peek preview) of a window or tab

target.mrk: Sets a static, iconic bitmap to display a live preview (also known as a Peek preview) of a window or tab

trans-unit.source: Handle to the window or tab.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the window or tab.

target.mrk: Handle to the window or tab.

trans-unit.source: Handle to the device-independent bitmap (DIB) to represent the specified window.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the device-independent bitmap (DIB) to represent the specified window.

target.mrk: Handle to the device-independent bitmap (DIB) to represent the specified window.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether display a frame around the provided bitmap, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether display a frame around the provided bitmap, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether display a frame around the provided bitmap, valid values:

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagPOINT structure that contains The offset of a tab window's client region from the host window's frame.

seg-source.mrk: $tagPOINT structure that contains The offset of a tab window's client region from the host window's frame.

target.mrk: $tagPOINT structure that contains The offset of a tab window's client region from the host window's frame.

trans-unit.source: This offset enables the tab window's contents to be drawn correctly in a live preview when it is drawn without its frame.

seg-source.mrk: This offset enables the tab window's contents to be drawn correctly in a live preview when it is drawn without its frame.

target.mrk: This offset enables the tab window's contents to be drawn correctly in a live preview when it is drawn without its frame.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

trans-unit.source: A window typically calls the _WinAPI_DwmSetIconicLivePreviewBitmap() function in response to a WM_DWMSENDICONICLIVEPREVIEWBITMAP message.

seg-source.mrk: A window typically calls the _WinAPI_DwmSetIconicLivePreviewBitmap() function in response to a WM_DWMSENDICONICLIVEPREVIEWBITMAP message.

target.mrk: A window typically calls the _WinAPI_DwmSetIconicLivePreviewBitmap() function in response to a WM_DWMSENDICONICLIVEPREVIEWBITMAP message.

trans-unit.source: The returned bitmap must not be larger than the client area of the window or frame and must have 32-bit color depth.

seg-source.mrk: The returned bitmap must not be larger than the client area of the window or frame and must have 32-bit color depth.

target.mrk: The returned bitmap must not be larger than the client area of the window or frame and must have 32-bit color depth.

trans-unit.source: The DWM uses a copy of the bitmap, but the caller retains ownership of the original bitmap and is responsible for freeing the resources that it uses when it is no longer needed.

seg-source.mrk: The DWM uses a copy of the bitmap, but the caller retains ownership of the original bitmap and is responsible for freeing the resources that it uses when it is no longer needed.

target.mrk: The DWM uses a copy of the bitmap, but the caller retains ownership of the original bitmap and is responsible for freeing the resources that it uses when it is no longer needed.

trans-unit.source: The DWM does not keep its copy of the bitmap when the DWM stops displaying the live preview representation.

seg-source.mrk: The DWM does not keep its copy of the bitmap when the DWM stops displaying the live preview representation.

target.mrk: The DWM does not keep its copy of the bitmap when the DWM stops displaying the live preview representation.

trans-unit.source: Require Windows 7 or later with enabled Aero theme.

seg-source.mrk: Require Windows 7 or later with enabled Aero theme.

target.mrk: Require Windows 7 or later with enabled Aero theme.

trans-unit.source: Load bitmap to create a thumbnail

seg-source.mrk: Load bitmap to create a thumbnail

target.mrk: Load bitmap to create a thumbnail

trans-unit.source: Set DWM window attributes to provide the iconic bitmap, and to always render the thumbnail and live preview using the iconic bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Set DWM window attributes to provide the iconic bitmap, and to always render the thumbnail and live preview using the iconic bitmap

target.mrk: Set DWM window attributes to provide the iconic bitmap, and to always render the thumbnail and live preview using the iconic bitmap

trans-unit.source: Register WM_DWMSENDICONICLIVEPREVIEWBITMAP window message to display live preview

seg-source.mrk: Register WM_DWMSENDICONICLIVEPREVIEWBITMAP window message to display live preview

target.mrk: Register WM_DWMSENDICONICLIVEPREVIEWBITMAP window message to display live preview

trans-unit.source: Register WM_DWMSENDICONICTHUMBNAIL window message to display thumbnail

seg-source.mrk: Register WM_DWMSENDICONICTHUMBNAIL window message to display thumbnail

target.mrk: Register WM_DWMSENDICONICTHUMBNAIL window message to display thumbnail
